snippet: Romney campaign aides said the candidate was focused on giving an address for graduates and their parents, “not a policy speech,” and that Mr. Romney would not overtly wade into the issue of same-sex marriage.
abstract: Romney campaign aides said the candidate was focused on giving an address for graduates and their parents, “not a policy speech,” and that Mr. Romney would not overtly wade into the issue of same-sex marriage.

headline.main: Romney to Avoid Same-Sex Marriage in Commencement Speech, Aides Say
headline.print_headline: Commencement: A Focus on Graduates, Not Policy
